AddGearTan_GEN4_Full.Name: IOTV Gen4 armor (Tan, full protection)
AddGearTan_GEN4_Full.Description: The Improved Outer Tactical Vest (IOTV) Gen IV is designed to permit maximum freedom of movement required to assume correct firing positions with the agility to execute and maneuver tasks. Optimal design characteristics ensure the best possible weight distribution of both the ballistic body armor system as well as additional load bearing equipment, thus providing enhanced comfort, wear duration, and mobility. Full protection kit.

AddGearTan_GEN4_Assault.Name: IOTV Gen4 armor (Tan, assault kit)
AddGearTan_GEN4_Assault.Description: The Improved Outer Tactical Vest (IOTV) Gen IV is designed to permit maximum freedom of movement required to assume correct firing positions with the agility to execute and maneuver tasks. Optimal design characteristics ensure the best possible weight distribution of both the ballistic body armor system as well as additional load bearing equipment, thus providing enhanced comfort, wear duration, and mobility. Increased ergonomics assault kit.

AddGearTan_GEN4_Mobility.Name: IOTV Gen4 armor (Tan, high mobility kit)
AddGearTan_GEN4_Mobility.Description: The Improved Outer Tactical Vest (IOTV) Gen IV is designed to permit maximum freedom of movement required to assume correct firing positions with the agility to execute and maneuver tasks. Optimal design characteristics ensure the best possible weight distribution of both the ballistic body armor system as well as additional load bearing equipment, thus providing enhanced comfort, wear duration, and mobility. Increased mobility and comfort kit.

AddGearTan_6B13.Name: 6B13 assault armor (Tan)
AddGearTan_6B13.Description: The main armored vest for personnel of combat units of the ground forces, airborne troops, marines, etc. The vest is designed to protect vital organs from being hit by firearms, shell fragments, mines, grenades, and cold weapons, reducing the severity of armor contusion injury when performing combat missions. Tan version.

AddGearTan_Hexgrid.Name: 5.11 Tactical Hexgrid plate carrier (Tan)
AddGearTan_Hexgrid.Description: The Hexgrid plate carrier with smooth ergonomic access that allows comfortable movement, intended for use with chest rigs. Manufactured by 5.11 Tactical.

AddGearTan_UntarVest.Name: Light Military Flak Jacket (Tan)
AddGearTan_UntarVest.Description: A class III body armor used by PMCs and security forces all around the world.

AddGearTan_Trooper.Name: HighCom Trooper TFO body armor (Tan)
AddGearTan_Trooper.Description: A plate armor vest by HighCom, popular among USEC PMCs. The lightweight AR500 class 4 (Russian GOST) protection plates cover only the chest and back areas. Tan version.

AddGearTan_Trooper_Clean.Name: HighCom Trooper TFO body armor (Tan, Clean)
AddGearTan_Trooper_Clean.Description: A plate armor vest by HighCom. The lightweight AR500 class 4 (Russian GOST) protection plates cover only the chest and back areas. Tan version.

AddGearTan_PACA.Name: PACA Soft Armor (Tan)
AddGearTan_PACA.Description: A light but durable and reliable body armor protecting only the vital areas, fitted with class 2 (Russian GOST) armor plates.

AddGearTan_6B2.Name: 6B2 body armor (Tan)
AddGearTan_6B2.Description: An old army body armor from Afghanistan war times, mainly designed to protect against pistol bullets and explosion fragments. It fulfilled its mission, but was soon replaced by bulletproof vests with differentiated protection.

AddGearTan_F4Terminator.Name: Eberlestock F4 Terminator load bearing backpack (Tan)
AddGearTan_F4Terminator.Description: An extremely versatile full-format load bearing backpack for military use. Manufactured by Eberlestock.

AddGearTan_Blackjack50.Name: Mystery Ranch Blackjack 50 backpack (Tan)
AddGearTan_Blackjack50.Description: A backpack made for long and successful raids, manufactured by Mystery Ranch.

AddGearTan_Beta2.Name: ANA Tactical Beta 2 Battle backpack (Tan)
AddGearTan_Beta2.Description: A lightweight and capacious backpack from ANA Tactical. Specially designed for use in dynamic conditions and on rough terrain.

AddGearTan_Medpack.Name: LBT-2670 Slim Field Med Pack (Tan)
AddGearTan_Medpack.Description: A low-profile medical backpack, designed to carry large amounts of specialized medical equipment and supplies. Manufactured by London Bridge Trading.

AddGearTan_MBSS.Name: Flyye MBSS Backpack (Tan)
AddGearTan_MBSS.Description: An extra durable backpack made from 1000D Cordura with a separate pocket for a water bladder and a MOLLE attachment system on the sides.

AddGearTan_Daypack.Name: LBT-8005A Day Pack backpack (Tan)
AddGearTan_Daypack.Description: A simple and reliable 14-liter backpack in Tan color. Manufactured by London Bridge Trading.

AddGearTan_Berkut.Name: WARTECH Berkut BB-102 backpack (Tan)
AddGearTan_Berkut.Description: A tactical backpack with front loading capabilities. Suitable for use by military and security forces, or for military tactical games. Manufactured in WARTECH.

AddGearTan_ops_core_mandible.Name: Ops-Core Fast GUNSIGHT Mandible (tan)
AddGearTan_ops_core_mandible.Description: Special additional ballistic protection for the Ops-Core FAST helmet, mounted on the Side Armor component

AddGearTan_tk_heavy_trooper.Name: Tac-Kek Heavy Trooper mask (tan)
AddGearTan_tk_heavy_trooper.Description: Tac-Kek Heavy Trooper, an additional helmet ballistic mask module based on the Ops Core type, based on the famous movie universe. This is the way.

AddGearTan_Galvion_Caiman_applique.Name: Caiman Hybrid Ballistic Applique (tan)
AddGearTan_Galvion_Caiman_applique.Description: Up-armor helmet shell attachment to elevate or enhance ballistic and fragmentation protection of the Caiman Hybrid Helmet.

AddGearTan_Galvion_Caiman_visor.Name: Caiman Fixed Arm Visor (tan)
AddGearTan_Galvion_Caiman_visor.Description: Locked-in ballistic visor shield for installation on helmet's shroud.

AddGearTan_ops_core_visor.Name: Multi-hit ballistic face shield-visor for Ops-Core FAST helmet (tan)
AddGearTan_ops_core_visor.Description: Special high-strength ballistic visor for the Ops-Core helmet, used by the special forces assault teams.

AddGearTan_ops_core_side_armor.Name: Ops-Core Fast Side Armor (tan) (tan)
AddGearTan_ops_core_side_armor.Description: Additional armor for Ops-Core FAST helmet, which protects the ears from shrapnel and small caliber ricochets

AddGearTan_Galvion_Caiman_mandible.Name: Caiman Ballistic Guard Mandible (tan)
AddGearTan_Galvion_Caiman_mandible.Description: Special additional ballistic protection for the Galvion Caiman helmet, mounted on the Side rails.

AddGearTan_ops_core_fast_visor.Name: Ops-Core FAST Visor (tan)
AddGearTan_ops_core_fast_visor.Description: FAST Visor designed to protect the eyes and part of the serviceman's face from shell fragments, mines, grenades, drops of chemically aggressive liquids and oils, coarsely dispersed aerosols, thermal factors, atmospheric influences and mechanical damages in all types of combat operations.

AddGearTan_CFBalaclava.Name: Cold Fear Infrared balaclava (Tan)
AddGearTan_CFBalaclava.Description: A quality balaclava with a special technological material, which ensures maximum warmth in the most severe frosts. But we do not need it for warmth. We need it to look tactical.

AddGearTan_HalfMask.Name: Lower half-mask (Tan)
AddGearTan_HalfMask.Description: A piece of cloth, typically a bandana, covering the face from nose and below, is the most typical attribute of a street gang member.

AddGearTan_MomexBalaclava.Name: Momex balaclava (Tan)
AddGearTan_MomexBalaclava.Description: A tactical balaclava with a single hole for eyes.

AddGearTan_ShemaghVer1.Name: Shemagh (Tan, ver. 1)
AddGearTan_ShemaghVer1.Description: A favorite headpiece of PMCs around the globe.

AddGearTan_6B47.Name: 6B47 Ratnik-BSh helmet (Tan)
AddGearTan_6B47.Description: 6B47 is an aramid helmet of Russian origin. As part of the Ratnik program, it is the new standard-issue helmet for most of the Russian Armed Forces. The 6B47 is similar to previous generation helmets such as the 6B7-1M and 6B27. It has equal protection but weighs slightly less, floats in water, and has mounting equipment for lights and night vision devices. The helmet can be fitted with a variety of covers for different environments.

AddGearTan_Galvion_Caiman.Name: Galvion Caiman Hybrid helmet (Tan)
AddGearTan_Galvion_Caiman.Description: The Caiman Hybrid helmet is a new generation of lightweight special forces helmet. A series of modular accessories enhances the package, providing users with lightweight, comfortable and maximum head protection. Manufactured by Galvion.

AddGearTan_MICH_2001.Name: MSA ACH TC-2001 MICH Series Helmet (Tan)
AddGearTan_MICH_2001.Description: The MSA Advanced Combat Helmet (ACH) delivers advanced ballistic, fragmentation, and impact head protection, with comfort for long-term use. The helmet’s low-profile design reduces the risk of interference in target acquisition and ensures compatibility with NVGs and headsets.

AddGearTan_MICH_2002.Name: MSA ACH TC-2002 MICH Series Helmet (Tan)
AddGearTan_MICH_2002.Description: The MSA Advanced Combat Helmet (ACH) delivers advanced ballistic, fragmentation, and impact head protection, with comfort for long-term use. The helmet’s low-profile design reduces the risk of interference in target acquisition and ensures compatibility with NVGs and headsets.

AddGearTan_TC_800.Name: MSA Gallet TC 800 High Cut combat helmet (Tan)
AddGearTan_TC_800.Description: The MSA TC 800 ballistic helmet, designed for use by tactical teams of police special forces, in combat and reconnaissance operations. It can be modified by various components.

AddGearTan_ACHHC.Name: HighCom Striker ACHHC IIIA black helmet (Tan)
AddGearTan_ACHHC.Description: A combat helmet manufactured by HighCom, the High Cut version. Does not feature any additional mounts. Tan version.

AddGearTan_Door_Kicker.Name: Door Kicker Boonie hat (Tan)
AddGearTan_Door_Kicker.Description: A well-worn "PriceLess" boonie hat. It is believed that those who wear it can open any door in this world.

AddGearTan_Head_Bandana.Name: Bandana (Tan)
AddGearTan_Head_Bandana.Description: A tan colored headgear, actively used by special forces around the world.

AddGearTan_Cap_Bear.Name: BEAR baseball cap (Tan)
AddGearTan_Cap_Bear.Description: A tactical BEAR PMC baseball cap. Tan version.

AddGearTan_Cap_Regular.Name: Baseball cap (Tan)
AddGearTan_Cap_Regular.Description: A tactical baseball cap. Tan version.

AddGearTan_UX_Pro.Name: UX PRO Beanie (Tan)
AddGearTan_UX_Pro.Description: The warm and comfortable UX PRO beanie. For you, only for you. And that guy, too.

AddGearTan_Beanie.Name: Beanie (Tan)
AddGearTan_Beanie.Description: A warm knitted beanie, traditionally made for skiers but worn by everyone.

AddGearTan_tacteccarrier.Name: 5.11 Tactec plate carrier (tan)
AddGearTan_tacteccarrier.Description: Plate carrier with armor plates made of polyethylene (class 5) and a set of pouches for work with assault rifles.

AddGearTan_anaalpha.Name: ANA Tactical Alpha chest rig (tan)
AddGearTan_anaalpha.Description: High-quality "Alpha" chest rig. Fully meets the military standards for reliability and functionality. The combination of integrated pouches and MOLLE straps provides the means of carrying a large number of necessary equipment. The vest is designed as a classic chest rig. In this type of vests all the gear is located in the front and side parts, while back part is comprised of adjustment belts and straps.

AddGearTan_anam1.Name: ANA Tactical M1 armored rig (tan)
AddGearTan_anam1.Description: Tactical rig with additional 4-class armor plates. The vest is created with the use of the best experience of Russian special forces operators. The versatility of the system makes it possible to use this vest both when carrying out city tasks and when performing tasks on rough terrain. Equipped with additional pouches.

AddGearTan_anam2.Name: ANA Tactical M2 armored rig (tan)
AddGearTan_anam2.Description: Tactical rig with additional 4-class armor plates. The vest is created with the use of the best experience of Russian special forces operators. The versatility of the system makes it possible to use this vest both when carrying out city tasks and when performing tasks on rough terrain. Equipped with additional pouches for 8 magazines.

AddGearTan_arscpc.Name: Ars Arma CPC MOD.2 plate carrier (tan)
AddGearTan_arscpc.Description: The second generation of modification of the CPC body armor designed by Crye Precision and adapted by Ars Arms for use by special forces of the Russian Federation. This modular body armor is based on a polymer corset that fits the body, which avoids the backlash of the body arm during active movement and also contributes to a evener distribution of weight. Made in the assault configuration of pouches and armor elements.

AddGearTan_mppv.Name: Velocity Systems Multi-Purpose Patrol Vest (tan)
AddGearTan_mppv.Description: Multi-Purpose Patrol Vest is designed for those patrolling situations where armor is not needed. Light rig with a lot of pouches.

AddGearTan_cryeavs.Name: Crye Precision AVS plate carrier (tan)
AddGearTan_cryeavs.Description: Crye Precision AVS rig equipped with light armored plates from combined materials. One of the most comfortable to wear plate-carrier.

AddGearTan_blackrock.Name: BlackRock chest rig (tan)
AddGearTan_blackrock.Description: Artisan custom-made chest rig for wearing on top of armor in urban operations. Sturdy and versatile, it features both MOLLE and ALICE attachment systems.

AddGearTan_d3crx.Name: Haley Strategic D3CRX Chest Harness (tan)
AddGearTan_d3crx.Description: The Haley Strategic D3CRX Combat chest rig is one of the most respected PMC rig systems. Ease and comfort of use are supported by the presence of the optimal number of pouches.

AddGearTan_lbt1961a.Name: LBT-1961A Load Bearing Chest Vest (tan)
AddGearTan_lbt1961a.Description: Tactical bearing system designed to carry magazines, grenades and special equipment, while using low-profile body armor.

AddGearTan_thunderbolt.Name: Direct Action Thunderbolt compact chest rig (tan)
AddGearTan_thunderbolt.Description: Direct Action fixed chest rig, containing all the basic pouches you need.

AddGearTan_tv109.Name: Wartech gear rig tan (TV-109, TV-106)
AddGearTan_tv109.Description: The heavy suspension system TV-109 is designed for attaching to the belt TV-106, or similar, in order to relieve some weight on the shoulders. The shoulders are reinforced with foam and have MOLLE straps, for transferring the belt complete with this system into a full-featured ALICE system.

AddGearTan_Cap_Backwards.Name: Baseball cap (Tan, backwards)
AddGearTan_Cap_Backwards.Description: A tactical baseball cap. Tan version.

AddGearTan_Cap_Tagilla.Name: BOSS cap (Tan)
AddGearTan_Cap_Tagilla.Description: A fancy tan BOSS cap. Yo, fella, you da real BOSS now!

AddGearTan_M92.Name: Gefechtshelm M92 (Tan)
AddGearTan_M92.Description: The Gefechtshelm M92 (or Gefechtshelm Schuberth B826) is the standard issue combat helmet of the Bundeswehr, first fielded in 1992 as a replacement of earlier M1956 steel helmets that were previously used during the Cold War. It is made from Aramid composite materials and is used by all branches of the Bundeswehr.
